remarks: Demonstration of a theorem (scheme) that requires (meta)variables ` x ` and ` y ` to be distinct, but no others.  It bundles the theorem schemes ` E. x ( x = y -> x e. x ) ` and ` E. x ( x = y -> y e. x ) ` .  Compare ~ dvdemo2 .  ("Bundles" is a term introduced by Raph Levien.) (Contributed by NM, 1-Dec-2006.)
statement:
dvdemo1 $p |- E. x ( x = y -> z e. x ) $.
$d x y $.
